item1.FIELD3: Sweet, juicy and with a distinctly garlicky flavor, this is the Pinoy version of the pork sausage done the Rufo's way. Served with fried egg

item2.FIELD3: Chunky tender morsels of Pampanga pork, marinated in pineapple sauce for a delectably sweet & juicy experience. Served with fried egg

item3.FIELD3: A generous serving of juicy corned beef, sauteed in onions, fried and served with farm-fresh scrambled egg

item4.FIELD3: The best seller since 1984! Mouth-watering, tender Batangas beef, marinated and served in Rufo's rich, sweet "Famous Sauce" with a side order of fried egg. The sauce is really a dish on its own! "Sauce Pa Lang Ulam Na!"

item5.FIELD3: Fresh from Dagupan, this milkfish is submerged in a unique combination of flavors & spices before deep-fried to a crispy golden perfection

item6.FIELD3: Choice-cut pork, pre-grilled and flavored with Rufo's special home-made Liempo marinade. Served hot with a side order of sweet Liempo sauce

item7.FIELD3: A hearty cut of T-Bone from the choiciest Batangas beef, marinated in its succulent juices with soy sauce, garlic & butter, served piping-hot and sprinkled with bits of garlic on a sizzling plate

item8.FIELD3: Delicious pork spring rolls fried crispy golden-brown, served with a rich sweet and sour sauce

item9.FIELD3: Prime cut pork, seasoned with Rufo's special sauce, carefully fried to a golden brown, while locking in its natural flavors

item10.FIELD3: Filipino-style beef steak submerged in the flavors of soy, lemon, shallots with a tinge of freshly ground pepper

item11.FIELD3: Tender pork shank and cutlets, slowly braised in spiced soy-pineapple juice and topped off with a sprinkle of banana blossoms

item12.FIELD3: Our iconic Rufo's Famous Tapa now in a sesame seed bun! Tender, juicy Batangas beef topped with farm fresh egg, and Baguio lettuce. More famous than any American roast beef sandwich!

item13.FIELD3: Juicy home-made beef pattie, served with tomato, Baguio lettuce, and lathered with our sweet Asian-inspired Famous Sauce. A perfect dish for people on the go!

item14.FIELD3: Southern Fried Chicken cooked to a Pinoy-style juicy-crispiness, sizzling in home-made gravy and buttered vegetables

item15.FIELD3: Generous chunks of Tofu deep-fried with delicious pork slices, and bathed in Rufo's sweet, sour and spicy Tokwa Dressing

item16.FIELD3: The Philippines' favorite "pulutan" contains the perfect blend of flavors and spices topped with farm fresh egg and served crackling in its own juices on a sizzling plate

item17.FIELD3: Finely chopped cubes of fresh, juicy chicken flavored with special spices, onions, and seasonings is the healthier version of our "Pinoy Pulutan". Served scorching hot on a sizzling plate with farm-fresh egg on top

item18.FIELD3: A sumptuous gelatin fusion of native chocolate milk and cream

item19.FIELD3: Creamy fruit cocktail with crushed honey graham crackers

item20.FIELD3: Rich cream and egg soup with a mix of garlic, spring onions and authentic Asian seasonings
